attributes.action: Do not lock us down before Christmas and New Year's Eve
attributes.additional_details: This looks like it will never end. We cannot live in prison for the rest of our lives. All of us know how to protect ourselves and I am sure all of us do this all the time.
attributes.background: Many people will be really upset again if there is another lockdown just before Christmas and New Year's eve. Many people couldn't even see their loved ones for a long time - even forever since the pandemic began. Let us have some time with our loved ones because time is priceless.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602920
